hero.title: SOGAT, PARTNER OF YOUR INDUSTRIAL PROJECTS

sermas.name: BIM / CIM

sp2i-prehension.name: Monitoring
sp2i-prehension.description: Structure testing, Automatic topographical monitoring, Inclinometer, Extensometer, Geophone, Online monitoring software ORIS Monitoring

aretec.name: 3D Acquisitions

tracip.name: Topography
tracip.description: Site monitoring, External control, Precision polygonal, Implementation, Setting out, Georeferencing

references.title: THEY TRUST US
references.description: A big thank you to our clients and partners for their loyalty: more than ever, we are committed to continuing to work with you to build the future.

metiers.title: Our Professions
metiers.description: We specialize in various professional domains, offering expertise across multiple sectors. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals who bring years of experience and deep industry knowledge to every project.
